name: Pathforge
description: An e-learning site that aims to redefine the self learning experience. It provides a community for online learners to help each other out and step through the materials together.

name:
ADP Timetabler
(aka Course Checker)
description: A web application for students in the ADP program of Taylorâ€™s University to generate a visually appealing & customizable timetable based on courses they want to take for their next semester.

name: Countries of the World
description: A website displaying information about all the countries in the world, gathered from an external api. It was built in less than 3 hours whilst teaching my students about the basics of the fetch api and javascript's promise callback chains.

name: things to do
description: A simple and elegant to do list application with a great UI built as practice while learning the vue framework and firebase firestore.
